title: Uncle Si Convinces a Waitress He’s Homeless
description:
Uncle Si convinces a waitress he’s homeless. Godwin meets a fan at a gas station and gets a gift that keeps on giving. Si is on a biology kick and shares the coolest facts about the animal kingdom. Martin expresses his love for Buc-ee's. John-David takes a trip to the zoo and reignites the black panther debate after Si misidentifies an animal. The listeners alert the guys to a new treat that will make the holidays a little sweeter, and the boys pick their wrestling entrance themes.
-
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
